external_games.name: Dungeon Defenders: Series EV Hero DLC

name: Dungeon Defenders: Series EV Hero DLC
summary: Assembled long ago by a master mechanic within the depths of Sky City, the Series EV automaton has been powered back to life and is ready for action! By placing down an array of powerful Electronic Beams of any length, EV can decimate enemy forces. The longer the length of the beam the more Defense Units each costs to build.
